updates.title: VAICOM PRO Community Edition for DCS World
updates.releasenotes: Beta Test build 2.9.3.8 - Expand Chatter Theme - Fallon (Completed sound set), Fix SRS PTT issues, DCS message table updated to latest version, Revert Viggen changes from previous beta awaiting Heatblur. Please check All other modules for SRS PTT behaviour.
